soldier1.soldier1: "soldier": I haven't thought that the king would become so cruel and sacrifice many people for his own longevity...
"soldier": Hello, warrior, your Highness is waiting for you inside.

soldier2.soldier2: "soldier": There are increasing magic soldiers. I have no idea what to do in the future.
"soldier": Hello, warrior, your Highness is waiting for you inside.

prince.prince: "Prince": Hello, warrior, an increasing number of soldiers were becoming bad magic soldiers,
"Prince": so it is hard for my troops to resist them.
"Prince": I know that you have special qualities so that you could resist being impacted by demonic energy in the previous wars,
"Prince": Therefore, I hope that you can carry out a task for us.

prince.Warrior: "Warrior": Right. Do you have a plan?

prince.Prince: "Prince": Yes. I am going to organize a feint attack to cover you to enter the magic castle built by the king.
"Prince": After sneaking in, you can act depending on the situation.
